website_summaries.verdict: Kaplan has a great reputation for developing robust materials, even though the content is not always on par with the actual test questions. The DVD, online access, and additional support materials are bonuses on top of the book itself.
pros: On a budget and in a time crunch?
This book features 6 practice tests and a comprehensive answer key for each question
You also get mobile access so you can access materials from any device, any time
cons: Kaplan tends to lean toward less-difficult questions, especially in the quantitative section, compared to the actual exam
You should not rely on this book alone if the quantitative section is not your forte

customer_reviews.title: Scared of the GRE? This book will lessen your fear about preparing for the test
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better than returning to college and earning a masters degree after age 60 to get your blood flowing and your blood pressure rising. This book was easy to read and gives great tips for recent graduates who have just earned their undergrad degree and also individuals who graduated decades ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D.

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful book. My niece has not taken this test since high school in 2010 and needed to take it again to go back to school to get her PhD. I gave this to her as an encouragement tool and she said that it not only helped her but her husband as well. She got a 300 when she took the test in high school and even with a family and work now, studying from this book allowed her to get a 290. Not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Angie C

customer_reviews.title: Great Read
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I am surprised to how well written this book is. Very very helpful. It helps you if youre intimidated by the exam. The book walks you step by step into understanding how the exam works, how to apply to graduate schools, and so much more. I was not expecting such a great book about the GRE?! I am so thankful to it. Helped me so much. Trust me, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good pricing. A lot of resources. Great over all.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my book two days ago. The front cover has a rip of an inch and a half or two inches on the bottom right side. It’s also been bent because of the rip. Despite that, everything else seems fine as of now. Prep Plus is the best way to go if you want everything about the GRE in one book. Otherwise you could purchase their separate books for each section of the GRE.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Climaco

customer_reviews.title: In-depth and fun to read
customer_reviews.text: Amazing so far. It’s been a few years since I’ve graduated with my Bachelor’s, and I was anxious about getting back into a studious lifestyle, but this guide has made the process enjoyable so far. I’m a few chapters in and am impressed with the level of depth this text offers for explanation to their practice sets. There is nothing left unanswered. Haven’t even used the online resources yet but I’m sure I’ll be satisfied. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Buy this book!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this book! It comes with online materials to use like sample full length GRE tests. It’s amazing! The reviews for the tests are extensive and give great explanations to how to answer the questions correctly. Would recommend to everyone, I already have been lol
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great GRE prep book
customer_reviews.text: This book provides useful strategys for improoving your written Englishh. Even my speling is getting bettah! #unintendedconsequences
customer_reviews.author: Supplemena

customer_reviews.title: FOR GMAT, NOT GRE
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if there is a HUGE different between the two exams, but this book is for the GMAT, NOT the GRE. Perhaps this is a defective item and the cover is incorrect, or perhaps one could use this book to prepare for the GRE, as well. However, as a first time GRE-taker, I want a GRE prep book! I hope Amazon looks into this as the product is being falsely/incorrectly advertised.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra slomko

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today and it arrived with a handful of ripped/folded pages. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It was okay to get the lay of the land but the vast amount of information covered on the GRE makes it hard to focus. The strategies are a good building block to answer the questions but not enough to get a high score.
customer_reviews.author: Christina J. Cmiel

customer_reviews.title: good English prep, just OK on the Math
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son to use preparing for the GRE. His English scores went up, but it was not as helpful on the Math part.
customer_reviews.author: Gone Fishin'

customer_reviews.title: Looked good
customer_reviews.text: Nice book. I ended up returning it because I accidentally ordered GRE and I needed a GMAT book.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Best GRE prep book
customer_reviews.text: I've read a lot of different GRE prep books, and this one by Kaplan is the best
customer_reviews.author: maddy

customer_reviews.title: Genuine product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my roommate who is studying. She was happy to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Evie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t taken GRE yet
customer_reviews.text: Big boom haven’t used it. Skimmed it. Organized well and seems easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great book...worth it! you get online access with tutorials and 5 practice tests!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING study tool
customer_reviews.text: This book helped me so much!!!! the online portion is especially helpful bc it mimics the tests and provides so many practice tests. you can also customize questions in the test bank section to really practice things you are not good at.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful, especially with the math sections. I would recommend getting this about a month prior to test taking.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Needs more practice
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like how it doesn’t have a lot of practice parts, but it is very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Keri foster

customer_reviews.title: The book and online resources are great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my GRE score, especially after not taking math for 20 years. I LOVED the online materials provided with the book. I'm pretty sure the strategies and practice questions online are the reason I did so well. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book if you are looking to understand the whole GRE experience this is for you. It will help you understand little tips to ace this test. It has strong content for both parts, vocabulary, and math. Moreover of multiple practice test. I will definitely recommend buying this book plus GRE flashcards. Study every day and good luck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and instructional
customer_reviews.text: A lot of practice and good explanations. I will take the GRE next week so we’ll see how it goes. Kaplan has good online resources as well
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: GRE excelent book
customer_reviews.text: Is a complete book to study for the GRE test, has practice test ect..
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I actually got significantly better scores before I used this guide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't even think. Great book
customer_reviews.text: Next year I am taking GRE test. It is your must have!
customer_reviews.author: xiuyingzheng

customer_reviews.title: Sent the Wrong Book
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the GRE prep plus 2020 and the cover of the book also says GRE but once you go to the first page it says GMAT prep plus 2020. The rest of the book also talks about studying for the GMAT not the GRE.
customer_reviews.author: leanna

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to be returning the book that I ordered by mistake, THR GRE PREP PLUS 2020 tomorrow, ty
customer_reviews.author: tammy busby

product_meta.title: GRE Prep Plus 2020: 6 Practice Tests + Proven Strategies + Online + Video + Mobile (Kaplan Test Prep)
